if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.yabm yabm, t.yalx yalx, t.yamc yamc, t.yazt yazt, t.yajb yajb, t.dxid dxid, t.dxmc dxmc, t.jgid jgid, t.jgbm jgbm, t.jgmc jgmc, t.zzrid zzrid, t.zzrmc zzrmc, TO_CHAR(t.zzsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzsj, t.shzt shzt, t.shrid shrid, t.shrmc shrmc, TO_CHAR(t.shsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') shsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name yalxmc, c4.code_name yaztmc, c6.code_name yajbmc, c8.code_name shztmc, c9.jgmc zzjgmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAZT = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_ORGANIZATION c9 on c9.UUID = t.jgid WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY NVL(xgsj,zzsj) DESC

SELECT , c2.code_name yalxmc, c4.code_name yaztmc, c6.code_name yajbmc, c8.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAZT = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c8.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZDDW(uuid,yabm,yalx,yamc,yazt,yajb,dxid,dxmc,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yalx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yazt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YA_ZDDW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

UPDATE YAGL_YA_ZDDW
yabm=#{yabm}, yalx=#{yalx}, yamc=#{yamc}, yazt=#{yazt}, yajb=#{yajb}, dxid=#{dxid}, dxmc=#{dxmc}, jgid=#{jgid}, jgbm=#{jgbm}, jgmc=#{jgmc},
shzt=#{shzt}, shrid=#{shrid}, shrmc=#{shrmc}, shsj=sysdate, xgrid=#{xgrid}, xgrmc=#{xgrmc}, xgsj=sysdate, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag}, datasource=#{datasource}, bz=#{bz},
sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE UUID = #{uuid}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZDDW(uuid,yabm,yalx,yamc,yazt,yajb,dxid,dxmc,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.yabm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabm,#{item.yalx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yalx,#{item.yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yamc,#{item.yazt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yazt,#{item.yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yajb,#{item.dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxid,#{item.dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxmc,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgbm,#{item.jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgmc,#{item.zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrid,#{item.zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrmc,#{item.zzsj,jdbcType=DATE} zzsj,#{item.shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shzt,#{item.shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrid,#{item.shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} shrmc,#{item.shsj,jdbcType=DATE} shsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), yabm = VALUES(yabm), yalx = VALUES(yalx), yamc = VALUES(yamc), yazt = VALUES(yazt), yajb = VALUES(yajb), dxid = VALUES(dxid), dxmc = VALUES(dxmc), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jgbm = VALUES(jgbm), jgmc = VALUES(jgmc), zzrid = VALUES(zzrid), zzrmc = VALUES(zzrmc), zzsj = VALUES(zzsj), shzt = VALUES(shzt), shrid = VALUES(shrid), shrmc = VALUES(shrmc), shsj = VALUES(shsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.code_name yalxmc, c4.code_name yaztmc, c6.code_name yajbmc, c8.code_name shztmc, c9.jgmc zzjgmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAZT = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_ORGANIZATION c9 on c9.UUID = t.jgid WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY NVL(xgsj,zzsj) DESC
SELECT t2.code_name FROM SYS_CODELIST t1,SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL t2 WHERE t1.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' AND t1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t1.CODEID = t2.CODEID AND t2.CODE_VALUE = #{VALUE}

SELECT , c2.code_name yalxmc, c4.code_name yaztmc, c6.code_name yajbmc, c8.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAZT = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c8.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.DXID = #{value} ORDER BY yajb ASC

SELECT , CASE t.SHZT WHEN '01' THEN 'danger' WHEN '02' THEN 'warning' WHEN '03' THEN 'success' ELSE 'text' END yashztButtonType, c2.code_name yalxmc, c4.code_name yaztmc, c6.code_name yajbmc, c8.code_name shztmc, c9.jgmc zzjgmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'YALX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YALX = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAZT = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'YAJB' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.YAJB = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c8.CODE_VALUE Left Join SYS_ORGANIZATION c9 on c9.UUID = t.jgid WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.yazt != '01' ORDER BY t.SHZT
SELECT count(0) FROM YAGL_YA_ZDDW t WHERE t.yabm LIKE concat(#{value},'%')
